name: SumoBalls
description:
The player is a ball that is controlled by pushing forward and backward. Rotating the camera changes orientation. The main goal is to stay at the top as long as possible. This is helped by bonuses (enhanced repulsion, jump and homing projectiles) and pushing opponents off the cliff.

w s  - push forward/back

a d - turn the camera

space - jump in under power bonus

f - shoot rockets under shoot bonus
